title: The Guide to the Peak of Quick Transmigration - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Omegaverse   System Administrator   World Hopping
author: 葬心未亡人
description:
Wu SiYu, who has never read about quick transmigration before, was prompted by a sudden impulse to open a classic quick transmigrating stallion novel that had been recommended by her bosom friend (female) for a long time.

From then on, she started the tragic “bent” road along with the “system” that exists only in name and is more of a hindrance than a help.

She constantly used different identities in different worlds, getting closer to the people with the same face.

Her goal is to, regardless of the trials and tribulations, bend the other party.

Finally, she was captured and brought back by the bent Lord BOSS XuanYuan YueMing of the first parallel world, and furthermore, tied up and kept a close eye on……>
